headline: Ask HN: Mac OS app that can be opened from anywhere
description:
Hello!

Some apps like Numi (https://numi.app/) can be opened from anywhere on Mac OS (including while having another app in fullscreen mode). Do you know other apps that functionnality? More precisely, I'm looking for an app that would allow me to write text in Markdown just as quickly as Numi.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 可以从任何地方打开的Mac OS应用程序
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 可以從任何地方打開的Mac OS應用程序
